text:
The Abbasi family does not know why the Afghan authorities said no to the return
06 Nov 2019, 19:10 by Kjerstin Rab책s
The family's lawyer, Erik Vatne, believes UNE's no is an attack on the family's legal security.
- The Immigration Board (UNE) has misinterpreted the law on public disclosure, Vatne tells Adresseavisen.
